attributes.action: impliment proportional voting so that every vote is counted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst a perfect voting scheme is only possible in a two party system our country currently uses the worst scheme avaliable for a society with more than two opinions. This is a hangover from when people didn't know any better, and should of been upgraded decades ago.

rejection.details: There is already a petition dealing with this issue
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
